title.rendered: Maple Avenue Middle School Opens The Kindness Closet

content.rendered: Maple Avenue Middle School is spreading the love this Valentine’s Day and all year long… The Maple Avenue Kindness Closet held a grand opening today. The Kindness Closet, led by members of Student Council and advisors, is a location where students can “shop” for clothing, school supplies, and personal care items at no cost. The Kindness Closet is a school-wide effort and is run entirely through donations.
